name: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
description: Climb the ancient Lion Rock to witness breathtaking frescoes and panoramic views.

name: Ella & Nine Arch Bridge
description: Experience the scenic train ride and marvel at the architectural wonder of the Nine Arch Bridge.

name: Galle Dutch Fort
description: Walk through history in this UNESCO World Heritage Site with charming cobblestone streets.

name: Kandy & Temple of the Tooth
description: Visit the cultural heart of Sri Lanka and the sacred temple that houses a relic of the Buddha.

name: Yala National Park
description: Embark on a thrilling safari to spot leopards, elephants, and a rich variety of birdlife.

name: Mirissa & Whale Watching
description: Relax on golden sands and set sail to witness the majestic blue whales in their natural habitat.

name: Nuwara Eliya
description: Explore the rolling hills of Sri Lanka's tea country, often referred to as 'Little England'.

name: Ancient City of Anuradhapura
description: Discover the sprawling complex of dagobas, monasteries, and ancient ruins.

name: Ancient City of Polonnaruwa
description: Step back in time at the second ancient capital of Sri Lanka, a marvel of historical architecture.

name: Arugam Bay
description: A world-renowned surfing hotspot with a laid-back vibe and beautiful beaches.
